sentences.sContent: a drug that has a beneficial effect on the immune system
sentences.sCn: 有益于免疫系统的一种药物

sentences.sContent: an arrangement that is mutually beneficial
...it is beneficial to the students themselves to study abroad...
...It is beneficial to encourage young people to explore the broader world and get ready to make it a better place...
...Most books on happiness today assert that happiness is beneficial to health...
...no matter how often Silicon Valley entrepreneurs praise the beneficial effects of an idea that fails or a start-up company that crashes and burns...
...Kapur has identified three conditions that promote this kind of beneficial struggle...
...“Goals are widely used and promoted as having really beneficial effects...
...Both of these certifications have been beneficial in getting good jobs...
...Some claim that it is beneficial for children’s development...

synos.tran: 有益的，有利的；可享利益的

remMethod.val: bene(善， 好) ＋ fic(做) ＋ ial(…的) → 做的事情有好处 → 有益的， 有利的

words.tran: 受益地；获利地；有使用权地
